name: Bunny Bazooka
description:
Follow me here

Reccomeded to Play in Fullscreen mode.
A Globe-Troting shoot-em-up where you are a Bunny with a Bazooka. Protect your cozy planets from an invasion of meterorites and other other-wordly creatures. JUST REMEMBER : RED things are invincible to your Bazooka.

Bunny Bazooka was made for Ludum Dare 42 under the theme of "running out of space".

Enjoy the game and do leave feedback.

Sounds/Music made using FL Studio
Textures created using Photoshop
Animation handled by Spriter2D
Built with Unity
